name: Resurrex
description:
A Meteor has hit earth and turned some people into zombies. However for you, a T-Rex set of bones in display at a museum, It has given you life! Finally after millions of years of plotting your revenge on the triceratops for kicking you off of the home planet you have your chance. You must find the meteor and ride it back to your home planet!

This game was created in one week for the gamedev.net game jam create by Clint Fleetwood (Founder of Aletheia Game Studio ) and Rick Spears (http://www.rickspearsart.com)
This is Rick Spears (a talented artist, and paleontologist) first time creating art for a video game.

Feel free to download it and play it and share it. If you'd like to toss us a buck or two we would really appreciate it! All proceeds go to Aletheia Game Studios to help pay for students game dev classes.

If you would like to continue to support Aletheia Game Studios in helping kids learn game development and game art consider becoming a Patreon.
